items.title: Rogue Judges Are Turning Judicial Review Into Judicial Rule
items.description: Boasberg’s ruling is just the latest example of a judge substituting his own political preferences for executive decision-making.

items.title: California’s Massive Medicaid Shortfall Would Disappear If It Quit Paying $8B For Illegals’ Health Care
items.description: Why is California spending $8.4 billion this fiscal year to serve as a magnet for unlawful immigration?

items.title: Illinois Bill Would Let Failing School System Send Homeschooling Parents To Jail
items.description: A new bill requires parents to report themselves to their local school district, and parents who do not will be considered truant.

items.title: Study: When Fewer Parents Are Married, Poverty And Violence Skyrocket

items.title: Judge Overreaches Amid Latest Lawfare Against Trump
items.description: Judge James Boasberg hastily took command and control over the latest iteration of lawfare. His orders and reactions are laden with error.
